keyMoments.title: General Franky Debut
keyMoments.description: Franky reveals his ultimate post-timeskip weapon by docking the Kurosai FR-U IV with the Brachio Tank V to form General Franky (BF-38), a 13-meter tall battle mecha.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the debut of Franky's most powerful creation, showcasing the results of his two years studying Dr. Vegapunk's technology on Karakuri Island. This becomes one of his signature abilities.

abilities.description: A giant 13-meter tall mecha formed by docking the Kurosai FR-U IV and Brachio Tank V together. Designated as BF-38 in the Battle Franky line.

reveals.information: Can combine his two vehicles into a giant battle mecha called General Franky

keyMoments.title: Luffy Promises to Protect Surume's Brothers
keyMoments.description: After discovering Hody has been blackmailing Surume by holding his brothers hostage, Luffy immediately promises to protect them, freeing Surume from Hody's control.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's natural ability to gain allies through compassion and bold promises rather than force or coercion, contrasting sharply with Hody's methods.
keyMoments.quote: Don't worry! I'll protect your brothers!

keyMoments.title: Luffy Confronts Hody Jones
keyMoments.description: Using Gear Second, Luffy bypasses the New Fishman Pirates officers to reach and confront Hody Jones directly.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of the final confrontation between Luffy and the arc's main antagonist.

relationships.description: Luffy gains Surume's loyalty by promising to protect his brothers, freeing him from Hody's blackmail.

evolutionMoments.description: Luffy promises to protect Surume's brothers, earning the Kraken's trust and allegiance.

keyMoments.title: Gust Sword
keyMoments.description: Nami uses her new post-timeskip technique, Gust Sword, with her upgraded Clima-Tact to attack the New Fishman Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Nami's enhanced weather manipulation abilities after her two-year training on Weatheria.

abilities.description: A wind-based attack using the upgraded Clima-Tact to create powerful gusts in a sword-like form.

keyMoments.title: Midori Boshi: Take Jave-rin
keyMoments.description: Usopp uses a new Pop Green technique that fires bamboo spears at enemy forces.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Usopp's expanded arsenal using the Pop Greens he cultivated during his training on the Boin Archipelago.

abilities.description: A Pop Green attack that fires bamboo spears as projectiles.

keyMoments.title: Daruma Attacks Brachio Tank V
keyMoments.description: Daruma uses his Cookie Cutter ability to burrow underground and his Daruma Drop technique to collapse the ground beneath Franky's Brachio Tank V.
keyMoments.significance: This attack sets up Franky's counter-reveal of General Franky.

abilities.description: Uses his powerful jaws to burrow through the ground and create tunnels, able to chew through granite and solid surfaces.
After creating multiple underground tunnels with Cookie Cutter, weakens the surface to cause massive ground collapses and pitfalls.

name.japanese: ホーディ・ジョーンズ

keyMoments.title: Hody's Blackmail Methods Exposed
keyMoments.description: It's revealed that Hody has been controlling Surume by holding his brothers hostage in the North Pole and threatening to kill them.
keyMoments.significance: Exposes Hody's ruthless methods and willingness to use hostages and coercion to achieve his goals.
keyMoments.quote: If you continue to disobey, I'll go to the North Pole and kill your brothers!

reveals.information: Uses blackmail and hostage-taking to control allies, specifically holding Surume's brothers captive

keyMoments.title: Surume's Situation Revealed
keyMoments.description: It's revealed that Surume has been forced to serve Hody Jones because Hody is holding his brothers hostage in the North Pole.
keyMoments.significance: Explains Surume's hostile actions and motivations, showing he was being coerced rather than willingly serving evil.

keyMoments.title: Surume Releases Shirahoshi
keyMoments.description: After Luffy promises to protect his brothers, Surume releases Princess Shirahoshi and switches his allegiance from Hody to Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Marks Surume's liberation from Hody's control and the beginning of his alliance with the Straw Hats.

relationships.description: Surume becomes Luffy's ally after Luffy promises to protect his brothers from Hody's threats.

evolutionMoments.description: Luffy's promise to protect Surume's brothers frees the Kraken from Hody's blackmail.

reveals.information: Has brothers living in the North Pole who are being held hostage by Hody Jones

keyMoments.title: Shirahoshi Released by Surume
keyMoments.description: After Luffy gains Surume's trust, the Kraken releases Shirahoshi from his grasp, freeing her from immediate danger.
keyMoments.significance: Allows Shirahoshi to escape capture and changes the dynamic of the battle.
